channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Don’t Forget the Catholic Bishops Persecuted by China
item.description: They stand as a testament to the reality that China represses the Catholic Church along with all its other religions.

item.title: When Did Google Search Become Totally Useless?
item.description: Why bother with making information accessible and usable if you can tell people what you want them to hear instead?

item.title: The School Choice Programs Democrats Hate Have Saved Taxpayers Up To $45 Billion
item.description: When families receive an ESA, which is typically around half of what the state spends per public education student, the state saves money.
